attributes.action: Extend the 'Right to buy' to private buy-to-let properties
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that most purchasers of buy-to-let properties expect the tenant to pay the mortgage on the property, surely the 'right-to-buy' legislation must be extended to cover these properties. This would seriously reduce the attraction of such investments and leave the properties available to first time buyers
